definitions.body: be displeasing: [[רַע בְּעֵינֵי]] Nu 11:10, Nu 22:34 (J), Jos 24:15 (E), Je 40:4, Pr 24:18 (c. [[וְ]] consec.) impf. [[יֵרַע בְּעֵינֵי]] Ge 21:11, Ge 21:12 (E), Ge 48:17 (J), 1Sa 8:6, 1Sa 18:8, 2Sa 11:25; later, [[וַיֵּרַעאֶל]] Jon 4:1 or [[וירעלְ]] Ne 2:10 (intensified by [[רָעָה גְרוֹלֶה]]), [[וַיֵּרַעלִי מְאׂר]] Ne 13:8.
be sad: [[ירע לבב]] De 15:10, 1Sa 1:8; [[יֵרְֽעוּ פָנַי]] Ne 2:3.
be injurious, evil: [[וַיִּרַע לְ]] Ps 106:32 it went ill with Moses, pers. subj. 2Sa 20:6; [[רָעָה עַיִן]] be grudging, c. [[ב]] pers., De 15:9, De 28:54, De 28:56.
be evil, wicked, ethically: ´[[וַיֵּרַע בְּעֵינֵי י]]: Ge 38:10 (J) 2Sa 11:27, Is 59:15; [[בְּעֵינֵי אֱלֽהַים]] 1Ch 21:7. †

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: suffer hurt: Impf. 3 ms. [[יֵרוֹעַ]] ([[רַע]]) Pr 11:15, Pr 13:20.
do an injury, hurt: abs. Ge 44:5 (J), Is 11:9 = Is 65:25, Je 31:28, Pr 4:16, Pr 24:8; opp. [[היטיב]] Is 41:23, Je 10:5, Zep 1:12 (all in prov. Phr. = do anything at all, cf. [[רָע]]

); [[הרע ל]] Ge 19:9, Ge 43:6, Ex 5:22, Ex 5:23, Nu 11:11 (J) Nu 20:15, Jos 24:20 (E) + 5 t.; c. acc. pers. Nu 16:15 (J) + 4t.; c. [[בְּ]], 1Ch 16:22 = Ps 105:15 (c. [[ל]]), Je 25:29, Ps 74:3; c. [[עִמָּדִי]] Ge 31:7 (E); c. [[על]] 1Ki 17:20 bring evil upon; swear [[לְהָרַע]], = to one’s hurt, Ps 15:4, Le 5:4 (P); Pt. = subst. [[לְבָכָם לְמֵêָרע]] Da 11:27 (shall be) for mischief.
